issue.title: [FCD] promise::XXX_at_thread_exit functions have no synchronization requirements
issue.discussion:
Addresses US-199
promise::XXX_at_thread_exit functions have no synchronization requirements. Specifying synchronization for these member functions requires coordinating with the words in 30.6.5/21 and 25, which give synchronization requirements for promise::set_value and promise::set_exception ( p. 26 ff., p. 29 ff.).
Resolution proposed by ballot comment:
Change 30.6.5/21 to mention set_value_at_thread_exit and set_exception_at_thread_exit; with this text, replace 30.6.5/25 and add two new paragraphs, after 30.6.5/28 and 30.6.5/31.
